title: Qaumi Taranah
summary: The "Qaumī Tarānāh" (Urdu: قومی ترانہ‎, pronounced [ˈqɔːmiː təˈɾaːnə], lit. ' "National Anthem"'), also known as "Pāk Sarzamīn" (Urdu: پاک سرزمین‎, pronounced [ˈpɑːk ˈsəɾzəmiːn], lit. 'Thy Sacred Land'), is the national anthem of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan. It was written by Hafeez Jalandhari in 1952 and the music was produced by Ahmad G. Chagla in 1949, preceding the lyrics.
